advisor_notification_invasion_enemy_won_.xenophobe: Our planet has been occupied by alien filth.
advisor_notification_invasion_enemy_won_.spiritualist: Blasphemers have occupied one of our planets.

advisor_notification_primitive_enlighted.militarist: We have made the primitive less ignorant.
advisor_notification_primitive_enlighted.xenophile: We've educated some less advanced xenos in the ways of the Galactic Community.

advisor_notification_colony_ship_destroy.militarist: The cowards have destroyed our colony ship.

advisor_notification_invasion_progress_0.militarist: Initiating ground assault. Victory shall be ours.
advisor_notification_invasion_progress_0.spiritualist: Our champions are making planetfall. May the spirits protect them.

advisor_notification_spaceborne_encounte.machine_empire: Alert. Non standard space entity encountered.
advisor_notification_spaceborne_encounte.materialist: Unshielded life signs detected in deep space.

advisor_notification_alien_vessel_encoun.militarist: We have encountered an alien vessel.
advisor_notification_alien_vessel_encoun.hivemind: We have met a vessel of the others.
advisor_notification_alien_vessel_encoun.spiritualist: We have encountered more children of creation.

advisor_notification_invasion_enemy_won_.militarist: The enemy dares to occupy one of our planets.

advisor_notification_primitive_enlighted.militarist: We have made the primitives less ignorant.
advisor_notification_primitive_enlighted.materialist: Primitive enlightenment program successful. I'm surprised their heads didn't pop.

advisor_notification_colony_ship_destroy.militarist: The cowards have destroyed our colony ship.
advisor_notification_colony_ship_destroy.xenophobe: Our colony ship has been destroyed.

advisor_notification_spaceborne_encounte.militarist: We have encountered some manner of spaceborne beast.

advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.militarist: It is a good day to die.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.pacifist: We build bridges, we don't raise them.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.xenophile: Whoa. Space. Just think about it.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.egalitarian: Democracy sure is an endless struggle.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.materialist: Okay, let's see here. Let's see the lower limit of. Oh, exponent eight and carry the one.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.hivemind: What is a single voice compared to a magnificent chorus? Our collective has an island of warmth and harmony in a sea of discord. How cold and lonely it must be to face the darkness of space alone.
advisor_generic_phrase_03.wav.authoritarian: The weak govern, the strong rule.

advisor_notification_station_under_attac.militarist: The enemy is targeting one of our stations.
advisor_notification_station_under_attac.xenophobe: One of our stations is under attack.
advisor_notification_station_under_attac.spiritualist: One of our stations is beset by enemies.

advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.militarist: Though they did not deserve it. A pre sentient species has been uplifted.
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.xenophile: We took some animals and made them people.
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.egalitarian: Presentients now walk their world as equals.
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.machine_empire: Presentient species elevated to Class 4 intelligence.
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.hivemind: A presentient species has been raised to sentience.
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.xenophobe: The brains of the Xeno animals have been enlarged. Is this wise?
advisor_notification_pre_sapient_uplifte.spiritualist: And so the lowly beasts were made to see the light.

advisor_notification_hostile_fleet_detec.militarist: We are tracking an enemy fleet.

advisor_notification_enemy_troops_landin.militarist: Our enemies hurl themselves at one of our planets.
advisor_notification_enemy_troops_landin.machine_empire: Planetary invasion alert. Malignant atmospheric incursion detected.
advisor_notification_enemy_troops_landin.xenophobe: Xeno invaders are defiling one of our planets.
advisor_notification_enemy_troops_landin.spiritualist: Heathens are invading one of our planets.

advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.militarist: Cry havoc and let slip the dogs of war.
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.pacifist: Pacifist module failing. Your breathing is so loud, it's driving me insane. Initiating count to 10. Protocol 1, 2, 3. Not working. Reboot. Reboot.
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.xenophile: The Blorg are very friendly creatures.
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.egalitarian: You seem overworked. Have you considered joining a union?
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.machine_empire: Alert. Possible organic life form detected. Seek, isolate, destroy.
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.materialist: No, no, no. It'll be fine. I'm telling you, just turn off the fail safes and wait. Is this thing on?
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.hivemind: The self is a prison from which only we have escaped.
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.xenophobe: These alien savages must be taught to kneel when in the presence of their betters. Shall I initiate purging protocols?
advisor_generic_phrase_02.wav.spiritualist: Thinking machines are an affront to nature. These profane constructs must never be allowed to. Oh, wait.

advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.militarist: An alien empire wishes to communicate.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.egalitarian: An alien empire is making contact.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.materialist: Close encounter of the third kind.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.hivemind: The others reach out to make contact with our Hind.

advisor_notification_station_under_attac.militarist: The enemy is targeting one of our stations.

advisor_notification_hostile_fleet_detec.militarist: We are tracking an enemy fleet.

advisor_notification_enemy_troops_landin.militarist: Our enemies hurl themselves at one of our planets.

advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.militarist: Only in battle can the true metal of any sentient organism be measured. Have a thee.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.pacifist: The only way to make peace with others is to make peace with yourself.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.xenophile: I may be an artificial intelligence, but I share your enthusiasm for seeking out fellow organic intelligences among the stars.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.egalitarian: Do not be afraid to exercise your individual right to free thought. Please take a moment now to practice.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.machine_empire: System diagnostic completed. All systems nominal.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.materialist: Boundless horizons, endless learning opportunities, bleeding edge discoveries, limited legroom.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.hivemind: We are one, we are all. Our unity cannot be divided.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.xenophobe: Under no circumstances must the xeno be trusted. It will lie, it will cheat, and it will do anything in its power to undermine the efforts of those who, in truth, are its superiors.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.authoritarian: Maintaining state cohesion as we venture into space presents a unique challenge. We shall face the challenge head on, and we shall be stronger for it.
advisor_generic_phrase_01.wav.spiritualist: I serve the faithful. There is no greater calling.

advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.militarist: An alien empire wishes to communicate. Ha.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.pacifist: An alien empire is reaching out to us.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.xenophile: They can talk, and they want to talk to us.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.egalitarian: Our presence in the galaxy has not gone by unnoticed.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.machine_empire: A foreign entity has decrypted our communications.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.materialist: An alien empire has established communications.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.hivemind: The others reach out to make contact with our mind.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.xenophobe: The Xeno Empire has somehow deciphered our language.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.authoritarian: A foreign power is hailing us.
advisor_notification_alien_empire_commun.spiritualist: An alien empire now speaks to us in the language of the Divine.

advisor_notification_fleet_detected_02.w.militarist: We are tracking a new fleet.
advisor_notification_fleet_detected_02.w.hivemind: We sense a swarm of the others.

advisor_notification_generic_war_declare.xenophobe: Xenomongrals have declared war on each other.
advisor_notification_generic_war_declare.spiritualist: The non believers are fighting amongst themselves.

advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.pacifist: They leave us no choice. Prepare for war.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.materialist: War declaration processed. Commencing live subject weapon testing.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.xenophobe: We have declared war on the abominable Xenos.

advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.militarist: Our foes have mustered the courage for war.
advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.pacifist: We have been dragged into a needless war.
advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.machine_empire: Priority alert. Malignant forces are moving against us.
advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.materialist: Warning. We are subject to a declaration of war.
advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.xenophobe: The nauseating Xenos have declared war on us.

advisor_notification_colony_established_.militarist: We have established a new planetary base.

advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.pacifist: Unfortunately, war is our only option.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.xenophile: We have declared war because some people have to learn the hard way.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.egalitarian: They are a threat to democracy.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.xenophobe: We have declared war on the nauseating Xenos.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.authoritarian: We have declared war to safeguard our interests.
advisor_notification_player_declare_war_.spiritualist: The crusade of the righteous begins.

advisor_notification_enemy_declared_war_.xenophobe: The contemptible Xenos have declared war on us.

advisor_generic_phrase_04.wav.egalitarian: We will have equality, liberty and justice for all. Or so I've been told. I'm just a robot.
